async fn start(client: &Client, ledger: &str) -> Result<(), Error> {
    let result = client
        .send_command()
        .start_session(StartSessionRequest::builder().ledger_name(ledger).build())
        .send()
        .await?;

    println!(
        "Session id: {:?}",
        result.start_session().unwrap().session_token()
    );

    Ok(())
}
